items.sentence: You can do that with Tom if you really want to.
Tom and his friends rode off on their bicycles.
I have no idea why Tom enjoys swimming so much.
Tom used to play the piano when he was younger.
Tom waits for me at the bus stop every morning.
Don\'t you think you\'d like to live in Boston?
Don\'t you think you\'ll go to college someday?
Tom might be able to teach French to your kids.
Tom might be here by 2:30, but then, maybe not.
We have some rose bushes in front of our house.
